280249.description:
Our one-bedroom holiday cottage, La Chaumi√®re, at Domaine de Rochebonne, offers a spacious and fully-equipped vacation experience. The bedroom features a large double bed, and the living room includes a comfortable sofa bed for additional sleeping space. Enjoy the privacy of your own garden and terrace, complete with garden furniture and a barbecue, as well as direct access to the vast communal gardens and large shared swimming pool. Children will love the playground with a wooden fort, sandbox, swings, badminton net, and football pitch, all safely enclosed within the walled and gated property.

280258.description:
A cozy studio located in the grounds of Le Domaine de Rochebonne on the first floor and suitable for two people. The living space is approximately 17 m2. The equipment of the rental includes a shower room with WC. Bed, fridge, microwave, electric hob, sink, dishes, barbecue, small courtyard + a nice balcony overlooking the grounds.¬†

The studio has access to the vast shared gardens and a large shared swimming pool. The facilities include kiddies play area and wooden fort, sand pit, swings, book and game room, badminton net and football area. The whole property is walled and gated so that parents can relax while the children can run and play.

280277.name: Le Pressoir 3 bedroom house

333855.description:
Welcome to our charming vacation home located in the southwestern region of France, in the village of Luzac, just 6 km away from the nearest beach and only 10 minutes away from the beautiful island of Ol√©ron. This characterful house boasts four comfortable bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a spacious open-plan living area that includes a fully-equipped kitchen, a cozy lounge, and a dining room. Set within a gated and enclosed garden, the house features a 5m x 10m private heated swimming pool that offers complete privacy and seclusion as it is not overlooked by neighboring properties. The pool area is fenced and secured for added safety.

This independent house with a garden and private pool is exclusively for you and your guests. Although not part of the Domaine de Rochebonne, the property is managed by our team. You can find a bakery, a butcher, and a pharmacy within a 5-minute walk in the village of Luzac. Just a 10-minute stroll will take you to the nearby village of St Just Luzac, where you can enjoy a shaded terrace in a bar-tabac, a bakery, a restaurant, and a grocery store. Within a 5-minute drive from Luzac, you can reach the lively town of Marennes, where you will find two large supermarkets, bakers, newsagents, numerous restaurants, shops, markets, a cinema, a leisure port, parks, squares, and a beach.

The accommodation features four bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a large open-plan living area that comprises a lounge, dining room, and kitchen.

On the ground floor, there is one bedroom with a double bed and French doors that lead to the patio. The ground floor also includes a bathroom with a shower. The spacious open-plan living area includes a lounge equipped with a flat-screen LCD TV, a video player, a hi-fi system, a DVD player, and Wifi. There is also a dining room with a wood-burning stove for the winter months and a fully-equipped kitchen with a washing machine, a dishwasher, and a microwave. The house has central heating and a wood-burning stove for chilly winter nights.

On the first floor, there are three bedrooms: one with a double bed and a single bed, one with a double bed, and one with three single beds. There is also a bathroom with a shower. The beds can be arranged to suit individual needs, and baby cots and high chairs are available.

Outside, there is a large terrace with outdoor furniture and a barbecue, a garden with a private heated swimming pool that is fenced and secured for added safety.
333855.name: 4 bedroom house with private pool

images.text: Domaine de rochebonne - location de vacances (5)
Domaine de rochebonne - location de vacances (35)

375769.description:
The Ch√¢teau de Rochebonne is a private oasis with its own swimming pool and gardens, ensuring complete privacy and seclusion. The property is surrounded by high walls and a gated entrance, allowing parents to relax while children play freely in the expansive gardens. Outdoor amenities include a large barbecue and comfortable garden furniture, as well as a private pool with no overlooking neighbors. Children will love the sandpit, swings, and sports equipment including tennis and badminton nets, while adults can enjoy the peaceful reading room and games room featuring table tennis.

New! Late checkout available. Please contact us for information.

This elegant chateau offers eight bedrooms, four bathrooms, a large fully-equipped kitchen, a back kitchen, a spacious living and dining room, a second living room on the top floor, a grand entrance hall with a beautiful stone staircase, and a library. The property also boasts free Wi-Fi throughout and satellite TV in the living areas.

The Ch√¢teau is fully equipped with a modern kitchen featuring a dishwasher, microwave, washing machine, oven, stove, and everything you need to enjoy local cuisine. The comfortable living areas are also furnished with satellite TV, perfect for unwinding after a long day.

The entire chateau is exclusively yours to enjoy during your stay, including access to the grounds, swimming pool, and private parking.

Our friendly team is on hand to welcome you, answer any questions you may have, and ensure your vacation is as relaxing and peaceful as possible.

House Layout:

Ground floor:

  • Large kitchen with dining table
  • Spacious living and dining room
  • Back kitchen
  • Separate toilet
  • Hallway

First floor:

  • Bedroom 1: king-size bed
  • Bedroom 2: twin beds ( access via bedroom 1)
  • Bedroom 3: king-size bed + a single bed
  • Bedroom 4: bunk beds
  • One bathroom and one shower room

Second floor:

  • Bedroom 5: king-size bed + a single bed
  • Bedroom 6: king-size bed + a single bed
  • Bedroom 7: king-size bed + a single bed
  • Bedroom 8: bunk beds
  • One bathroom and one shower room
375769.name: 8 bedroom Chateau with private pool.
